content: by binding off and stitching the 2 ends together or by using the kitchener stitch method with the live sts 9 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern knit i-cord with crochet bobble cont let s finish up by adding the puff stitches to one edge of your scarf you can choose to omit this step if you choose you will be working through the side of each row through both legs of the 2nd stitch of the i-cord see pic below with your 3 75mm/f crochet hook join yarn at point b see diagram above make a puff st in the same space slip_stitch in the next 2 row* repeat *to* to c ending with a puff st slip_stitch in next space and fasten_off hide all loose tails and block to finished measurements below should you have any questions please send them to pattern help unrulystitch@gmail com feel free to use the hashtag #theunrulystitchmakes on instagram or facebook of your works in progress and finish pieces mb make bobble instagram https //www instagram com/unrulystitch knit front and back 2 times into next stitch then knit into front one more time turn ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/theunrulystitch work so wrong side is facing you purl 2 together p2tog p1 p2tog turn work so right side is facing you slip slip knit pass s2kp fluff bobble if necessary this pattern is a copyright © of anne arundale of the unruly stitch unruly klee created using this pattern may be sold in small quantities with written consent first given by anne arundale of the unruly stitch credit must be given to anne arundale of the unruly stitch pattern for a video tutorial on s2kp please visit and photos can not be used for resale purposes distribution in part or in whole of this pattern is www purlsoho com/create/slip-slip-knit-pass-s2kp/ strictly forbidden please share your work with the hashtag #theunrulystitchmakes and #unrulyklee 10 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch pattern blocking measurements c a b-c 33 ½ inches/85 cm a-b 39 inches/99 cm b a-c 53 ½ inches/136 cm 11 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch
